Commands¶

Details on the general usage of Django’s built-in commands can be found here.

syncdefinitions¶

class avocado.meta.management.commands.syncdefinitions.Command(*args, **kwargs)¶

Finds all models in the listed app(s) and attempts to create a Definition instance per model field. Definitions already declared will not be altered.

Usage:

python manage.py syncdefinitions <app app.model ...>

Options:

--create-domains - create a single Domain corresponding to each model that is evaluated

--include-non-editable - creates Definitions for fields that are not editable in the admin

orphaned¶

class avocado.meta.management.commands.orphaned.Command¶

Determines if any Definitions are no longer valid. This is typically only necessary when a data model change occurs. Orphaned Definitions will be marked if they are currently published e.g. [P].

Usage:

python manage.py orphaned

Options:

--unpublish - unpublishes orphaned Definitions if currently published
